data.title: Ridwaan Khan on LinkedIn: Last week marked my farewell to Auckland Transport, within my time at AT ,…
data.meta_description: Last week marked my farewell to Auckland Transport, within my time at AT , I’m thankful for the experience, challenges, adventure and lessons learnt along the…
data.text:
New Beginnings at May Road Primary School to Lynda , Beth and staff - What a journey it has been with ups and downs but we made it, many thanks to those who came along for the journey , the team dug in deep to deliver a beautiful 15 teaching space structure from top to bottom with a new PUDO (pickup and drop off)..big thanks to Contractor Stryde Projects (Etienne,Terry, Stuart,Albert & Kelvin, Architects Jasmax (Andrew, Sam & Vance), Project Management Tetra Tech Coffey (Tom, Simon&Peter), Rawlinsons QS (Corne & David) and the Ministry of Education Staff (Amanda,Eric & Vishi ) for your brilliant proactive approach to construction and being part of this delivery team, your tireless works ethic envisages "teamwork & hard work" does pay off. The school moves in on the 22nd July 2024, can't wait to see the joy on those kids faces which is priceless rendition of inner satisfaction to a Delivery Manager. ❤️

May Road Primary School is in the heart of Mt Roskill , as we edge closer to handover , the team on the ground have been working hard to achieve these milestone goals and objectives of success , we hope that the next step will include the smiles on hundreds of kids to be in awe of this incredible achievement..the passion from our students drive us and is truly infectious and we hope that this project will inspire them for greatness…

As the building grows and improves the backdrop to the site , the neighbourhood view becomes increasingly attractive… the new building 16TS at Owairaka District School… amidst the construction shines a bright and vibrant team, thanks to Ignite Architects, Stryde Projects,Beca Project Management, Kingstons QS for there patience and dedication…we getting together Aroha whanau…

...Working with people sometimes can be brings its own challenges, ranges of individuality and complexity.. but when all are working to a common goal , the success of a project is priceless, and worth the challenges along the way , thank you to a great team , whose work and efforts are truly valued ..cant wait until the kids get to walk in and see the joys and smiles on their faces when they enjoy this beautiful building... the best inner satisfaction a Delivery Manager could ask for... #strydeprojects , #tetratech , #jasmax,#rawlinsons,#mayroadschool. As we are nearing the festive season 14 working days to Christmas, I would like to give thanks to this great team..

What defines you , is it the legacy you leave behind or is it the one minute or 60 seconds of kindness you take out of your busy day to tell some one , anyone .. “Hello”, KiaOra, … we take people for granted when they here but when they are no longer with us .. we reminisce what should of been said .. mental health is important and we all need to know that kind people are here for us… #bekindtoyourself ..

It’s great to be part of team that delivers an amazing experience to Aoteroa and the world .. the 2023 FIFA Women World Cup came to a magnificent conclusion on Sunday with Spain beating England in a close match… the Mahi and Aroha ..unbelievable… being a Volunteer and part of the experience is priceless…
